text: The following lists events that happened in 1953 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Ásgeir Ásgeirsson *Prime Minister - Steingrímur Steinþórsson, Ólafur Thors ==Events== ==Births== Herbert Guðmundsson *9 February - Egill Ólafsson, singer, songwriter and actor *19 February - Hannes Hólmsteinn Gissurarson, political scientist *1 May - Ragnheiður Gestsdóttir, children's writer *19 June - Össur Skarphéðinsson, politician *26 June - Kristján L. Möller, politician. *15 December - Herbert Guðmundsson, singer-songwriter ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1950s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1953 in Iceland
